data: I dipped through the filmy curtain into the boys' half of the dressing room and there was Sid sitting at the starâ€™s dressing table in his threadbare yellowed undershirt, the lucky one, not making up yet but staring sternly at himself in the bulb-framed mirror and experimentally working his features a little, as actors will, and kneading the stubble on his fat chin.
